jumbotron.title: A platform for your Rope Skipping achievements!
jumbotron.bottom: If you are a club, you are just right here!

work_in_progress.title: Work in Progress
work_in_progress.text: myJumpData is developed in an open-source model. This means everybody can read through the source code. Also, this allows everyone to help with developing this project.

open_source.title: Open Source
open_source.text: Since the Development started in mid-October, this project is still a beta version and under active development.

user_focused.title: User focused
user_focused.text: You found a bug? Or have a feature idea or request? Contact us, and we'll try and implement your suggestions.

cta.title: Ready, Set, Go!
cta.text: Get your account at myJumpData now!

by.title: By Skippers for Skippers
by.text: Rope Skipper at <0>Jumping Swans Hanau</0>, where the Idea for myJumpData was born with a coach.
